name: Switch

inputs.name: Index
inputs.description: Controlling which item to be selected, it will be rounded to 0, 1, 2 etc. For example, if the input is 1.4, it will be recognized 1, if it is 1.5, it will be 2, so on and so forth

outputs.description: Execute next node when index is 0
Execute next node when index is 1
Execute next node when index is 2

description: Switch Exec according to the input index
